Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based power plant incorporating an oxyfuel combustion process to reduce carbon dioxide emissions is analyzed.
Titulo: Design of SOFC based oxyfuel combustion systems with anode recycling and steam recycling options

Sentencas: The effects of key parameters, such as the steam-to-carbon ratio, fuel utilization factor, and temperature, on the current density, voltage, heat production, and requirements of each unit are investigated.
Titulo: Design of SOFC based oxyfuel combustion systems with anode recycling and steam recycling options

Sentencas: In addition, the overall performance of the SOFC-oxyfuel integrated systems with anode recycling and steam recycling are studied and compared.
Titulo: Design of SOFC based oxyfuel combustion systems with anode recycling and steam recycling options

Sentencas: The SOFC system with anode recycling provides better electrical efficiency than that with steam recycling because of the high utilization of fuel in the SOFC and the ability to integrate a fuel turbine.
Titulo: Design of SOFC based oxyfuel combustion systems with anode recycling and steam recycling options

Sentencas: In the SOFC with steam recycling, a fuel turbine cannot be implemented because there is insufficient heat for preheating the inlet streams, which is primarily used to vaporize the recycling stream.
Titulo: Design of SOFC based oxyfuel combustion systems with anode recycling and steam recycling options

Sentencas: The conditions for SOFC-oxyfuel combustion in systems with anode or steam recycling that provide the optimum electrical efficiency are also analyzed.
Titulo: Design of SOFC based oxyfuel combustion systems with anode recycling and steam recycling options
